devdoc.details: Designed for AI-compatible worker matching - each milestone can have a different assignee State Machine:   Created  Assigned  Accepted  InProgress  Submitted  Approved  Paid                      Declined (returns to Created, clears assignee) Roles:   - Client: Project owner, funds milestones, approves/rejects work   - PM: Optional project manager, can assign workers, earns commission   - Assignee: Worker assigned to a specific milestone (can vary per milestone)

acceptMilestone(uint256,uint256).details: Can only be called by the assignee

approveMilestone(uint256,uint256).details: Only client can approve. Pays assignee minus PM fee.

assignMilestone(uint256,uint256,address).details: Can be called by client or PM. Worker must then accept.

params.assignee: Address of the worker to assign

cancelProject(uint256).details: Can only cancel if no milestones are submitted or in progress with work done

params.initialAssignees: Optional array of initial assignees (can contain address(0))
params.pm: Address of the project manager (can be address(0) for no PM)
params.pmFeeBps: PM fee in basis points (0-2000, i.e., 0-20%)

declineMilestone(uint256,uint256,string).details: Can only be called by the assignee. Returns milestone to Created status.

emergencyReclaim(uint256,uint256).details: Client can reclaim funds after extended timeout

expireAssignment(uint256,uint256).details: Anyone can call this to clean up stale assignments

rejectMilestone(uint256,uint256,string).details: Returns milestone to InProgress status for revision

startMilestone(uint256,uint256).details: Can only be called by assignee after accepting

submitMilestone(uint256,uint256,string).details: Can be called from Accepted or InProgress status

unassignMilestone(uint256,uint256).details: Can be called by client or PM. Only works for Assigned status (before acceptance).

devdoc.title: ProjectEscrow

approveMilestone(uint256,uint256).notice: Approve a milestone and trigger payment

assignMilestone(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Assign a worker to a milestone

cancelProject(uint256).notice: Cancel project and refund unpaid milestones

createProject(address,uint256,string[],u.notice: Create new project with milestones and optional PM

getAddressRole(uint256,address).notice: Check if address is involved in a project

getAllMilestones(uint256).notice: Get all milestones for a project

releaseMilestone(uint256,uint256).notice: Release payment for approved milestone (legacy) or auto-release after timeout

unassignMilestone(uint256,uint256).notice: Unassign a worker from a milestone

userdoc.notice: Milestone-based escrow with per-milestone assignment and explicit acceptance
